title: Google\Cloud\Dataflow\V1beta3\LaunchTemplateParameters
name: LaunchTemplateParameters
description:
Parameters to provide to the template being launched.

Generated from protobuf message google.dataflow.v1beta3.LaunchTemplateParameters

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.job_name
params.description: Required. The job name to use for the created job.

params.name: data.parameters
params.description: The runtime parameters to pass to the job.

params.name: data.update
params.description: If set, replace the existing pipeline with the name specified by jobName with this pipeline, preserving state.

params.name: data.transform_name_mapping
params.description: Only applicable when updating a pipeline. Map of transform name prefixes of the job to be replaced to the corresponding name prefixes of the new job.
